description:
The two first met on the set of "Vial of Sun," the TV drama in which Junta is making his acting debut. During the shoot, while interacting with Takato for the first time, Junta gets the distinct impression that he’s hated. And yet, at the same time, he has feelings that he’s never experienced before.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Suki de Ite mo Ii Desuka.
好きでいてもいいですか.
